name: NBCNews
text: France will impose a nightly curfew on almost one third of the country's 67M people, including those in the Paris region, in effort to control the coronavirus, President Macron says; curfews begin Saturday and will last 4 weeks. https://t.co/VaPoUADXox

name: NBCNews
text: Walmart says it will be splitting up its Black Friday sales into 3 different events this year in order to contain crowds during the coronavirus pandemic and to avoid overwhelming the supply chain. https://t.co/HZiHSlf43Z
